alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Crook (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 13 at 10:18AM MDT until April 14 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow and areas of blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch, mainly across northwestern Butte County and northeastern Crook County. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...In Wyoming, Northeastern Crook County. In South Dakota, Butte County. * WHEN...Until midnight MDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.
